original_text: So all the Israelite leaders came together to meet with King Solomon. This happened during the Festival of Huts in the seventh month of the year, called Ethanim.
korean_text: 이스라엘 모든 사람이 다 에다님월 곧 일곱째 달 절기에 솔로몬 왕에게 모이고

sentences.original_text: So all the Israelite leaders came together
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모든 이스라엘 지도자들이 함께 모였다

sentences.original_text: This happened during the Festival of Huts
in the seventh month of the year
